## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards (PSR-12)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `composer lint:fix` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `composer analyse` and fixed all PHPStan errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `php artisan test` and all tests pass

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have added/updated docblocks for new/modified methods

### Dependencies
- [ ] This change does not introduce new dependencies
- [ ] Or: I have added necessary dependencies to composer.json/package.json

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This change does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] Or: I have documented all breaking changes in the PR description
